panel.name: INFORM.DAT
panel.listname: INFORM.DAT System owner and application details
panel.note:
Licence information, base web address. This panel still need a lot of work and some things may not be all that necessary.

But check it

field.name: P1F23
field.note: All spaces are stripped with the field formula

field.name: P1F24
field.formula: ~IF length[subfield[~ FIELD=P1F23 ~;"/\";2]]=0 THEN~ CR ~ subfield[~ FIELD=P1F23 ~;"/\";1]~ CR ~ELSE IF length[subfield[~ FIELD=P1F23 ~;"/\";3]]=0 THEN~ CR ~ subfield[~ FIELD=P1F23 ~;"/\";2]~ CR ~ELSE IF length[subfield[~ FIELD=P1F23 ~;"/\";4]]=0 THEN~ CR ~ subfield[~ FIELD=P1F23 ~;"/\";3]~ CR ~ELSE IF length[subfield[~ FIELD=P1F23 ~;"/\";5]]=0 THEN~ CR ~ subfield[~ FIELD=P1F23 ~;"/\";4]~ CR ~ELSE IF length[subfield[~ FIELD=P1F23 ~;"/\";6]]=0 THEN~ CR ~ subfield[~ FIELD=P1F23 ~;"/\";5]~ CR ~ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF ENDIF~ CR CR CR CR

field.name: P1F18
field.note: This field has an Initial Value at Create set to the number 1. This field is used as the sole value in an index ensuring that this panel can only have one record.

panel.name: CONFIG.DAT
panel.listname: CONFIG.DAT System Configuration and Defaults

field.name: P2F2
field.formula: FIELD=P2F2 ~ CASES~ CR ~CASE cv="U" OF "U" ENDOF /* User or person */~ CR ~CASE cv="R" OF "R" ENDOF /* Role */~ CR ~CASE cv="G" OF "T" ENDOF /* Group or Team */~ CR ~CASE cv="T" OF "T" ENDOF /* Group or Team */~ CR ~DEFAULT ""~ CR ~ENDCASES~ CR

field.name: P2F3
field.formula: FIELD=P2F2 ~ CASES~ CR ~CASE cv="U" OF "User level" ENDOF~ CR ~CASE cv="R" OF "Role level" ENDOF~ CR ~CASE cv="G" OF "Group (Team) level" ENDOF~ CR ~CASE cv="T" OF "Group (Team) level" ENDOF~ CR ~DEFAULT "<Undefined>"~ CR ~ENDCASES~ CR

panel.name: WEBPARAM.DAT
panel.listname: WEBPARAM.DAT Parameters from Synthetic T-Log File

panel.name: IMPORT.DAT
panel.listname: IMPORT.DAT Panel in which to import bulk data

panel.name: USERSTAT.DAT
panel.listname: USERSTAT.DAT User Status such as Current, Future, Past, Unassign

panel.name: ROLES.DAT
panel.listname: ROLES.DAT Roles Master Table

field.name: P6F1
field.formula: ~(IF ~ FIELD=P6F3 ~=0 THEN ~ FIELD=P6F4P6F1 ~ ELSE ~ FIELD=P6F5P6F1 ~ ENDIF) + 1~

field.name: P6F2
field.formula: ~/* 1st 6 records */~ CR FIELD=P6F1 ~ CASES~ CR ~CASE cv=1 OF "System Admin" ENDOF~ CR ~CASE cv=2 OF "Player" ENDOF~ CR ~CASE cv=3 OF "Official" ENDOF~ CR ~CASE cv=4 OF "Coach" ENDOF~ CR ~CASE cv=5 OF "Manager" ENDOF~ CR ~CASE cv=6 OF "Recruiter" ENDOF~ CR ~DEFAULT ~ FIELD=P6F2 CR ~ENDCASES~ CR

field.name: P6F8
field.formula: ~/* 1st 4 records */~ CR FIELD=P6F1 ~ CASES~ CR ~CASE cv=1 OF "A" ENDOF~ CR ~CASE cv=2 OF "P" ENDOF~ CR ~CASE cv=3 OF "A" ENDOF~ CR ~CASE cv=4 OF "A" ENDOF~ CR ~CASE cv=5 OF "A" ENDOF~ CR ~CASE cv=6 OF "A" ENDOF~ CR ~DEFAULT ~ FIELD=P6F2 CR ~ENDCASES~ CR

panel.name: GROUPS.DAT
panel.listname: GROUPS.DAT Teams and Groups Master Table

field.name: P7F1
field.formula: ~(IF ~ FIELD=P7F2 ~=0 THEN ~ FIELD=P7F3P7F1 ~ ELSE ~ FIELD=P7F4P7F1 ~ ENDIF) + 1~

field.name: P7F5
field.formula: FIELD=P7F5 ~ CASES ~ CR ~CASE cv="y" OF "Y" ENDOF~ CR ~CASE cv="n" OF "N" ENDOF~ CR ~DEFAULT~ CR ~ ~ FIELD=P7F1 ~ CASES~ CR ~ CASE cv=1 OF "N" ENDOF~ CR ~ DEFAULT ""~ CR ~ ENDCASES ~ CR ~ENDCASES~ CR ~ ~

field.name: P7F6
field.formula: FIELD=P7F1 ~ CASES~ CR ~CASE cv=1 OF "Officials" ENDOF~ CR ~DEFAULT~ CR ~ ~ FIELD=P7F6 CR ~ENDCASES~

panel.name: LOGINS.DAT
panel.listname: LOGINS.DAT Session Login data

field.name: P8F9
field.formula: ~IF ~ FIELD=P8F1 ~=1 then~ CR ~ ~ FIELD=P8F1P9F6 CR ~ELSE~ CR ~ truncate[~ FIELD=P8F1P9F6 ~] " " ~ FIELD=P8F1P9F7 CR ~ENDIF~

panel.name: USERS.DAT
panel.listname: USER.DAT Users, eg Players, Officials, Unauthenticated peopl

field.name: P9F2
field.formula: ~(IF ~ FIELD=P9F3 ~=0 THEN ~ FIELD=P9F4P9F2 ~ ELSE ~ FIELD=P9F5P9F2 ~ ENDIF) + 1~

field.name: P9F6
field.formula: ~IF ~ FIELD=P9F2 ~=1 THEN~ CR ~ "System Admin"~ CR ~ELSE~ CR ~ ~ FIELD=P9F6 CR ~ENDIF~

field.name: P9F7
field.formula: ~IF ~ FIELD=P9F2 ~=1 THEN~ CR ~ "Admin"~ CR ~ELSE~ CR ~ ~ FIELD=P9F7 CR ~ENDIF~

field.name: P9F8
field.formula: ~IF ~ FIELD=P9F2 ~=1 THEN~ CR ~ "admin"~ CR ~ELSE~ CR ~ lower.case[~ FIELD=P9F8 ~]~ CR ~ENDIF~

field.name: P9F15
field.formula: ~IF ~ FIELD=P9F2 ~=1 AND ~ FIELD=P9F15 ~="" THEN~ CR ~ "espxttbq" /* password */~ CR ~ELSE~ CR ~ ~ FIELD=P9F15 CR ~ENDIF~ CR ~ ~

field.name: P9F23
field.formula: ~IF ~ FIELD=P9F2 ~=1 THEN~ CR ~ "C"~ CR ~ELSE~ CR ~ ~ FIELD=P9F23 CR ~ENDIF~

field.name: P9F25
field.formula: ~IF ~ FIELD=P9F2 ~=1 THEN~ CR ~ "O"~ CR ~ELSE~ CR ~ ~ FIELD=P9F25 ~ CASES~ CR ~ CASE cv="p" OF "P" ENDOF~ CR ~ CASE cv="o" OF "O" ENDOF~ CR ~ CASE cv="c" OF "C" ENDOF~ CR ~ DEFAULT ""~ CR ~ ENDCASES~ CR ~ENDIF~

field.name: P9F26
field.formula: FIELD=P9F25 ~ CASES~ CR ~CASE cv="P" OF "Player" ENDOF~ CR ~CASE cv="O" OF "Official" ENDOF~ CR ~CASE cv="C" OF "Coach" ENDOF~ CR ~DEFAULT ""~ CR ~ENDCASES~

field.name: P9F27
field.formula: ~IF ~ FIELD=P9F2 ~=1 THEN~ CR ~ "N"~ CR ~ELSE~ CR ~ ~ FIELD=P9F27 CR ~ENDIF~

field.name: P9F20
field.formula: ~IF ~ FIELD=P9F20 ~="" AND ~ FIELD=P9F27 ~="Y" THEN~ CR ~ apply.format["GZZZZZZZZZ9";(today * 86400) + now]~ CR ~ELSE~ CR ~ ~ FIELD=P9F20 CR ~ENDIF~

field.name: P9F16
field.formula: ~IF ~ FIELD=P9F16 ~="" THEN~ CR ~ ~ FIELD=P9F17P2F4 CR ~ELSE~ CR ~ ~ FIELD=P9F16 CR ~ENDIF~

field.name: P9F32
field.formula: FIELD=P9F32 ~ CASES~ CR ~CASE cv="W" OF "W" ENDOF /* Web registration by self */~ CR ~CASE cv="S" OF "W" ENDOF /* Web registration by self */~ CR ~CASE cv="I" OF "I" ENDOF /* Data Import */~ CR ~CASE cv="A" OF "A" ENDOF /* Some administrative entry, eg coach,official */~ CR ~DEFAULT "D" /* dataperfect interactive or other?? */~ CR ~ENDCASES~

panel.name: USERMAIL.DAT
panel.listname: USERMAIL.DAT Users Emails Addresses

panel.name: USERROLE.DAT
panel.listname: USERROLE.DAT User Roles, ie roles user has had assigned to th

field.name: P11F15
field.formula: FIELD=P11F4P6F9 ~ CASES~ CR ~CASE cv="T" OF "<Team>" ENDOF~ CR ~CASE cv="R" OF ~ FIELD=P11F14P20F5 ~ ENDOF~ CR ~CASE cv="U" OF ~ FIELD=P11F13P20F5 ~ ENDOF~ CR ~CASE cv="N" OF "" ENDOF~ CR ~ENDCASES~

panel.name: URG.DAT
panel.listname: URG.DAT User-Role-Groups, ie Groups assigned to a us

field.name: P12F3
field.formula: ~IF ~ FIELD=P12F3 ~="" THEN~ CR ~ ~ FIELD=P12F9P2F4 CR ~ELSE~ CR ~ ~ FIELD=P12F3 CR ~ENDIF~

field.name: P12F7
field.formula: ~truncate[~ FIELD=P12F4P7F6 ~] IF length[~ FIELD=P12F4P7F12 ~]>0 THEN " (aka " truncate[~ FIELD=P12F4P7F12 ~] ")" ELSE "" ENDIF~ CR

field.name: P12F17
field.formula: FIELD=P12F2P6F9 ~ CASES~ CR ~CASE cv="T" OF ~ FIELD=P12F16P20F5 ~ ENDOF~ CR ~CASE cv="R" OF ~ FIELD=P12F15P20F5 ~ ENDOF~ CR ~CASE cv="U" OF ~ FIELD=P12F14P20F5 ~ ENDOF~ CR ~CASE cv="N" OF "" ENDOF~ CR ~ENDCASES ~

panel.name: ERROR.DAT
panel.listname: ERROR.DAT Return Codes and Error codes from operations

panel.name: IMPHEADR.DAT
panel.listname: IMPHEADR.DAT Import File Header

panel.name: ASSOC.DAT
panel.listname: ASSOC.DAT Information about Associations in which teams play

panel.name: CATEGORY.DAT
panel.listname: CATEGORY.DAT The class of team, eg mens, women's boys, girls,

panel.name: YEARS.DAT
panel.listname: YEARS.DAT Years recorded in the system

field.name: P17F1
field.formula: ~IF lower.case[~ FIELD=P17F1 ~]="past" OR~ CR ~ (~ CR ~ contains["12";"*" substring[~ FIELD=P17F1 ~;1;1] "*"] AND~ CR ~ contains["90";"*" substring[~ FIELD=P17F1 ~;2;1] "*"] AND~ CR ~ contains["01234567890";"*" substring[~ FIELD=P17F1 ~;3;1] "*"] AND~ CR ~ contains["01234567890";"*" substring[~ FIELD=P17F1 ~;4;1] "*"] AND~ CR ~ (contains["abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz";"*" substring[~ FIELD=P17F1 ~;5;1] "*"] OR length[~ FIELD=P17F1 ~]=4) ~ CR ~ )THEN~ CR CR ~ ~ FIELD=P17F1 CR ~ELSE~ CR ~ ""~ CR ~ENDIF~ CR CR ~ ~

field.name: P17F3
field.formula: ~99999 -~ CR ~(~ CR ~(convert["G9999";substring[~ FIELD=P17F1 ~;1;4]] * 10) +~ CR ~((length[subfield["#abcdef";lower.case[substring[~ FIELD=P17F1 ~;5;1]];1]])//7)~ CR ~)~

panel.name: USERNOTE.DAT
panel.listname: USERNOTE.DAT Notes about user

panel.name: NOTETYPE.DAT
panel.listname: NOTETYPE.DAT Types of notes about users

panel.name: REGO.DAT
panel.listname: REGO.DAT Registration Information (Official)

field.name: P20F7
field.formula: ~IF ~ FIELD=P20F1 ~=1 then~ CR ~ ~ FIELD=P20F1P9F6 CR ~ELSE~ CR ~ truncate[~ FIELD=P20F1P9F6 ~] " " ~ FIELD=P20F1P9F7 CR ~ENDIF~
